name: Night Fisher
description:
You have joined the Lunar Fishing Club, a high-class organization with a high cost of entry. Even the budget option is ridiculous, forcing you to pay hundreds of coins every day, and forcing you to continually catch fish to "increase your fishing time". In order to stay a member, you must continually sell off the valuable Lunar Pond fish under the strict time limits and increasing cost. How long can you last?

Coding: TripleCubes

Art: candycaneannihalator
